title: A toolbox for enzymatic modification of nucleic acids with photosensitizers for photodynamic therapy
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00103F, Paper
Open Access

Germain Niogret, Camille Chériaux, Frédéric Bonhomme, Fabienne Levi-Acobas, Carlotta Figliola, Gilles Ulrich, Gilles Gasser, Marcel Hollenstein
Photodynamic therapy (PDT) is an approved cancer treatment modality. Despite its high efficiency, PDT is limited in terms of specificity and by the poor solubility of the rather lipophilic photosensitizers...
